meta.purpose: Chatbot training corpus extracted from UI copy

utterances: What is included in each plan?
responses: We offer three plans: Explorer (Free), Visionary, and Legend. Explorer lets you start free with a static 3D home scene and a partial questionnaire. Visionary unlocks a full 3D interactive scene with customization, mirror mode for your dream body, one car, and a future partner. Legend includes everything: all advanced customization, advanced mirror mode with body, face and emotions, daily AI Dream Coach sessions, dream life video generation, and access to our private Visionaries Community.

facts.free: Explorer (Free Plan) includes one static 3D home scene, partial life vision questionnaire, no mirror mode or customization, and a simple preview.

faqs.a: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade at any time. Changes apply next billing cycle; upgrades unlock features immediately.
Yes, 50% discount with a valid .edu email; contact support with your student ID.
Your dream worlds are preserved; some advanced features become unavailable until you upgrade again.
All plans include email support within 24 hours. Legend users get priority support under 4 hours plus live chat and phone support.
All paid plans include a 14-day free trial; cancel during the trial to avoid charges.

faqs.q: Can I use the platform offline?
faqs.a: An internet connection is required for AI processing and sync. Previously generated content is viewable offline for up to 30 days.

responses: Our mission is to democratize dream manifestation by combining artificial intelligence with immersive technology so anyone can visualize and work toward their ideal life. We bridge the gap between dreams and reality through personalized AI-generated experiences.

Our core values are Innovation First, Human-Centered design, and Accessible Magic. We push AI and immersive tech boundaries, build from human psychology and aspirations, and make advanced technology effortless for everyone.

Sample team roles include Head of AI, CTO & Co-Founder, Head of Generative AI, and Company Director, represented by profiles like Alex Stone, Maya Rodriguez, Marcus Nova, and Aria Vega. (Images are illustrative placeholders.)
Key stats: 50M+ dreams visualized, presence in 200+ countries, 99% uptime, founded in 2019.

Three steps: 1) Tell us your goals via a simple questionnaire. 2) AI world creation transforms them into 3D environments. 3) Immerse yourself in your vision and stay motivated seeing your future daily.
Based on the character you create, AI generates inspiring sentences capturing your future lifestyle, values, and aspirations. It's unique, motivational, and shareable/editable for your journey.
bullets: Unique manifest aligned with your dream character

responses: You can reach us by phone (+0123 456 789), email (demo@gmail.com), or visit us in San Francisco, CA. We welcome questions and stories about your dream manifestation journey.
Start free with the Explorer plan and upgrade as your dreams grow. Every plan includes our core manifestation technology.

kb_articles.title: Pricing Plans Overview
kb_articles.content: Explorer: static 3D scene + partial questionnaire. Visionary: full 3D interactive scene, customization, mirror mode (dream body), one car, future partner. Legend: all features, advanced mirror (body + face + emotions), daily AI coach sessions, video generation, community access.

kb_articles.title: Support Levels
kb_articles.content: All plans: email support <24h. Legend: priority <4h + live chat + phone (business hours).

kb_articles.title: Personalized Manifest Feature
kb_articles.content: AI generates an individualized manifest describing lifestyle, values, aspirations; motivational, revisitable, shareable, editable.

kb_articles.title: User Journey Steps
kb_articles.content: 1. Questionnaire collects goals. 2. AI generates immersive 3D world. 3. User explores vision for motivation.
